00027 #ifndef MAX_PCI_BARS
00028 #define MAX_PCI_BARS 7    // do not count/use the expansion ROM
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 #define MAX_DRIVER_NAME_LEN 128
00032 #define MAX_DRIVER_VERSION_LEN 128
00033 
00034 
00035 
00036 typedef char DriverVerStr_t[MAX_DRIVER_NAME_LEN];
00037 
00038 
00039 
00043 typedef struct
00044 {
00045     ULONG nBAR;
00046     ULONG physStartAddr;
00047     ULONG size;
00048     bool memMapped;
00049     USHORT flags;
00050     UCHAR type;
00051 
00052 } PCI_BAR_t;
00053 
00054 
00065 typedef struct
00066 {
00067     // Device Memory Access info
00068     ULONG numBARs;
00069     PCI_BAR_t BAR[MAX_PCI_BARS];
00070 
00071     UCHAR PCICfgReg[256];
00072 
00073     // Device Interrupt Info
00074     bool hasInterrupt;
00075     ULONG intrVector;
00076 
00077 } PCIResourceInfo_t;
00078 
00079 
00085 typedef struct
00086 {
00087         // Instance and device location info
00088         ULONG devID;     
00090         ULONG  busNum;         
00091         USHORT deviceNum;      
00092         USHORT functionNum;    
00093         ULONG   UINumber;      
00095         // Device DMA Common buffer memory info
00096         bool hasDmaBuf;        
00097         ULONG DmaBufSize;      
00098         bool DmaAddr64;        
00099         ULONG DmaPhyAddrHi;    
00100         ULONG DmaPhyAddrLo;    
00103         char DriverName[MAX_DRIVER_NAME_LEN];   
00106 } ExtraResourceInfo_t;
